doc:
Sean Gunn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Gunn 0 Sean Gunn (born May 22, 1974) is an American actor known for his roles as Kirk Gleason on the television show Gilmore Girls (2000–2007) and Kraglin in the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Guardians of the Galaxy (2014), and Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017). He is the younger brother of filmmaker James Gunn, and often appears in his sibling's films. Sean_Gunn ( born May_22_,_1974 ) is an_American_actor known for his_roles as Kirk_Gleason on the_television_show_Gilmore_Girls ( 2000 – 2007 ) and Kraglin in the_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe in Guardians of the_Galaxy ( 2014 ) , and Guardians of the_Galaxy_Vol . 2_(_2017_) . He is the_younger_brother of filmmaker_James_Gunn , and often appears in his_sibling 's_films .
